name: Time Warp
overview: Attempt to capture the enchanted ring and banish the Time Lord. The player controls a small character who can move in all directions through a number of maze-like screens. The player picks up offensive, defensive powerups, as well as bullets, treasures, and tools as they explore. Treasures and tools can be used to collect items and clues to the quest. The player gains experience by killing enemy creatures. There is a save and restore feature.
